content:
There's an auto-up option with this add-on:

https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-us/thunderbird/addon/text-insert-text-blocks/
creator: sfhowes

content: If the account is IMAP, is it accessed on another device such as a phone?
creator: sfhowes

content: Select a subfolder, then right-click, Properties. Is 'When getting...' checked?
creator: sfhowes

content: Select the exponent, then Format/Text Style... Superscript (see picture). Press Alt if the Menu Bar with Format is hidden.
creator: sfhowes
